mapper.insert: insert into PARAMETERS (SPECIFIC_CATALOG, SPECIFIC_SCHEMA, SPECIFIC_NAME, ORDINAL_POSITION, PARAMETER_MODE, PARAMETER_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH, CHARACTER_OCTET_LENGTH, NUMERIC_PRECISION, NUMERIC_SCALE, DATETIME_PRECISION, CHARACTER_SET_NAME, COLLATION_NAME, ROUTINE_TYPE, DTD_IDENTIFIER ) values (#{specificCatalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specificSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specificName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordinalPosition,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parameterMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{characterMaximumLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{characterOctetLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numericPrecision,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{numericScale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{datetimePrecision,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{characterSetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtdIdentifier,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select SPECIFIC_CATALOG, SPECIFIC_SCHEMA, SPECIFIC_NAME, ORDINAL_POSITION, PARAMETER_MODE, PARAMETER_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH, CHARACTER_OCTET_LENGTH, NUMERIC_PRECISION, NUMERIC_SCALE, DATETIME_PRECISION, CHARACTER_SET_NAME, COLLATION_NAME, ROUTINE_TYPE, DTD_IDENTIFIER from PARAMETERS
